Reviews.Title: Impressive!
Reviews.Author: A. Stammerjohn "six-s ranch"
Reviews.Content: This door answering system is so cool!  The tv is crystal clear - the radio and telephone are awesome as well.  We love it.  The only thing to improve it would be to have an answering machine built into it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Hands-free security and media access in one compact unit
Under-the-counter 7" LCD panel with built-in TV and AM/FM radio tuners
Monitor features digital clock with alarm, local digital voice message recorder, speaker phone and IR remote control
Color front-door camera connected to monitor provides security and peace of mind
Camera features 55° V x 68° H viewing angle
ProductInfo.Name: Nutone Color Video Door Answering System with 7" Drop-down Monitor
